org.eclipse.january.dataset

Interface IFileConnection

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDatasetConnector, IRemoteData

    public interface IFileConnection

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPath()
      DataServer path, a local path on the server used to locate the remote dataset.
      void setPath(String path)
      DataServer path, a local path on the server used to locate the remote dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        DataServer path, a local path on the server used to locate the remote dataset.
        Returns:
        the file path to the data in the file system of the remote machine

      • setPath

        void setPath(String path)
        DataServer path, a local path on the server used to locate the remote dataset. This path may also be a directory where the data collection will happen. In this case when the first file is written, the dataset must be made up of files with the same extension.
        Parameters:
        path - to the data in the file system of the remote machine
